entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Onefour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Onefour AAFC 07:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -14.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -15.4°C
Wind: ENE 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning this morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow after midnight. Local blowing snow before morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
